remarks: The predicate "is a lattice volume".  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
islvol2a.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
islvol2a.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islvol2a.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islvol2a.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
islvol2aN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( R e. A /\ S e. A ) ) -> ( ( ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) .\/ S ) e. V <-> ( P =/= Q /\ -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ -. S .<_ ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) ) ) ) $.
